item.title: Marvel Rivals: Best Characters To Counter Spider-Man
item.description:
Summary

  • Mantis, Cloak and Dagger, and Luna Snow are the best Strategists against Spider-Man.
  • Peni Parker's traps and web-stun can disrupt Spider-Man's back-line attacks.
  • Hela, Scarlet Witch, and Namor are the best Duelists against Spider-Man.

Spider-Man is one of the best heroes in Marvel Rivals when it comes to infuriating the enemy back line, and even the Vanguards on specific maps (such as Hell's Heaven, where he can drag enemies off-stage). While the dive-DPS character quickly takes out healers and other Duelists, keeping the team together can become difficult.

Luckily, Spider-Man isn't too difficult to counter, as there are several different characters that can make Spider-Man's attempts at the back line impractical. Since Spider-Man relies on easy targets that are distanced from their teammates, positioning, composition, and the right DPS heroes can stomp the Web-Head out so the team can focus on the objective.

7 Mantis

The Sleeping Spore

Spider-Man usually targets the Strategists on his opponent's team, as they are behind their teammates and have less health than other characters. With that in mind, players will need right Strategists to prevent Spider-Man from ruining a team's composition entirely. Mantis is a fantastic pick against Spider-Man, thanks to her ability to sleep foes.

With her sleep spore, Mantis can render an opponent unconscious. This sleep spore can prevent Spider-Man from taking out Mantis and ensure that she and/or her teammates get a quick KO on the DPS hero.

6 Peni Parker

Mines and Web-Stun

The Vanguards in Marvel Rivals don't have an exact counter to Spider-Man themselves, yet Peni Parker has proved very efficient at countering many characters with her webs and mines. Against Spider-Man, Peni Parker can help out her back line allies by placing mines around them.

When Spider-Man swings in to disrupt her healers, he'll be blown away by Peni's traps. Another prominent feature of Peni is her ability to stun foes with her web. When Spider-Man uses his ultimate AoE ability, Peni can use her web to stop his ultimate instantly.

5 Luna Snow

Healing Ultimate to Counter Damage and Self-Heal

Luna Snow is another strong pick for a Strategist on a team when going up against Spider-Man. Her ultimate ability allows her to save the entire team by constantly restoring their health, making incoming damage useless. A more focused counter to Spider-Man in Luna's abilities is the fact that she can slowly heal herself.

Spider-Man relies on his entire kit to land a KO combo; if he has one or two abilities on cooldown, he's unable to land a quick KO on an enemy. While Luna heals herself, Spider-Man will be unable to utilize his abilities efficiently, and will inevitably swing away to avoid losing a fight.

4 Scarlet Witch

Auto-Lock Primary Fire Counters Mobility

For those attempting to heal the Web-Slinger or those trying to shoot him down, it proves very difficult. Due to his high mobility, Spider-Man is constantly dodging ranged attacks. Scarlet Witch is a direct counter to this mobility, as the powerful Avenger can use her auto-lock primary fire to drain Spider-Man's health.

While he swings around, especially in an open area, Scarlet Witch can ensure the team's safety by not allowing Spider-Man the time to land a KO. Placing her stun ability upon herself or an ally also potentially stuns Spider-Man if he dives into the stun's AoE.

3 Cloak and Dagger

Auto-Lock Primary Fire and Healing Bubble

Like Scarlet Witch, both Cloak and Dagger's primary fire have an auto-lock feature that counters Spider-Man's mobility with ease. While Dagger can hit Spider-Man from further away with her less-damaging daggers. Meanwhile, Cloak can deal more damage with his lesser-ranged 'beam' move that slowly drains health.

Another counter within Cloak and Dagger's kit is Dagger's healing bubble, which heals too fast for Spider-Man's combos to achieve a KO on the Strategists. This healing bubble can also be used on other 'squishy' allies to prevent Spider-Man from harming them.

2 Hela

Hitscan Primary Fire and Stun Ability

Hela is an incredible Duelist in Marvel Rivals who has been regarded as one of the best DPS characters in the game. With her hitscan primary fire, immense damage, and escape tools, Hela can directly focus on Spider-Man to ensure he's unable to prove useful to his team.

In just a few hits, Hela can KO Spider-Man with her primary fire; the hitscan makes it much easier to land hits on a swinging Spider-Man. Hela also has a stun ability that, when launched, pulls in an enemy and stuns them for a short time. This utility move is a significant way for Hela to KO Spider-Man swiftly.

1 Namor

Auto-Lock Turrets

When the opposing team has a Lord Spider-Man that has proved essential, it comes as no surprise when Namor gets brought out to counter him. Namor is the best way to counter Spider-Man, as his turrets make Spider-Man's life much more difficult. With Namor's oceanic-creature turrets that auto-lock onto enemies, Spider-Man is unable to swing around and attack, since the turrets are either knocking him out or damaging him enough to where he must swing away.

Namor's primary fire has lots of damage potential as well, which is a notable way of finishing Spider-Man off after two or three turret shots have landed. Even after Spider-Man decides to solely target Namor, Namor can use his ability to fly in a protective bubble to stop Spider-Man from dealing any more damage to him, gain heals from allies, and buy time for his turrets to land some shots on Spider-Man.

item.title: Doom: The Dark Ages Flips One Series Tradition on its Head
item.description:
Doom: The Dark Ages is shaping up to be a worthy successor to 2020's Doom Eternal , a game that is often considered one of the best first-person-shooters ever made. With Id Software offering an extended look at this new Doom during Xbox's recent Developer_Direct, there's more reason than ever before to be excited about this fresh medieval twist on the modern Doom formula.

It's no secret that Doom has reinvented itself over the years, whether it be through the slower, more atmospheric action-adventure of Doom 3 or the run-and-gun, white-knuckle gameplay of the 2016 Doom reboot, and Doom: The Dark Ages is no different in this regard. Set before the events of Doom (2016), The Dark Ages follows an early invasion of Demons, and the state of the world, alongside the player's suite of unique weaponry, mirrors this stark change in setting. The science-fantasy medieval flavor of its premise means a more brutal and distinct spate of tools at the player's disposal, but the world state also seems to indicate that the Doom Slayer will be fighting alongside an army of human soldiers, suggesting a radical departure from the one man vs. the world elevator pitch of previous entries in the series. Whether this will impact gameplay is unclear, but it is certainly something to note.

Doom: The Dark Ages Will See Doom Slayer Fight Among His Allies

The Doom Slayer Won't Be Alone, Which Could Be a Good Thing

The Doom Slayer, in all his incarnations, never exactly needs help. His loosely defined persona is characterized by his power as a two-legged killing machine, built and bred for no other purpose than to reign death and terror upon the demonic scourge. This is why most Doom games, especially the last two, don't feature allies fighting alongside him, as it would seem almost ridiculous for such an inhumanly powerful entity, who has no real match in the realm of humanity, to be aided by mere mortals; they would be more likely to slow him down than anything else.

And one might expect this to be the case with the human allies shown in Doom: The Dark Ages ' promotional footage. The game may be similar to something like Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 in this way: the unstoppable Space Marines are lauded and praised by their human allies, who effectively worship them as they attempt, however feebly, to help drive back the alien forces. This buttresses the feeling of superhuman power that is so central to the Space Marine experience, as it is to the Doom experience.

There's also a lot of promise on the narrative front. The Doom Slayer having more allies to interact with, and being backed by an entire army, could help better communicate his motivations. These allies could firmly represent the humanity that the Doom Slayer is attempting to save from destruction. Plus, there's something to be said about the grand scale of these quasi-medieval battles, which could be best conveyed by having two armies—one human and one demonic—going toe-to-toe with each other, rather than just having one man fighting alone.

The Possible Downside of Doom: The Dark Ages Prominently Featuring Allies

As previously mentioned, no human ally, regardless of talent or even physical augmentation, is likely to hold a candle to the Doom Slayer in terms of raw power. As long as Doom: The Dark Ages is cognizant of this and doesn't, for instance, orchestrate situations where the player is rescued by these allied troops, then all should be well. If something like this were to occur in the game, then it could undermine the brutal power fantasy that is inherent to the Doom franchise.

item.title: The Sims 4: 15 Best LGBTQ+ Mods
item.description:
Summary

  • The Sims 4 offers customization options for gender identities, romantic preferences, and pronoun selections.
  • Mods provide additional enhancements for Pride Month festivities, including pride flags, makeup, and accessories.
  • Players can create inclusive and expressive Sims with mods like Pride Palette, Yeehaww-Sims Pride Recolours, and LGBT Mod.

The Sims 4 has brought a wealth of customization options, allowing players to fine-tune their Sims' gender identities, romantic and WooHoo preferences, and pronoun selections. These updates have been a significant step forward in representing the LGBTQIA+ community within the game, making the virtual world of The Sims more reflective of real-world diversity.

Despite these advancements, there's always room for growth and improvement. Many players hope to see future updates that further enhance how Sims can experience Pride Month festivities and express their unique identities. In the meantime, various mods created by the Sims community provide excellent ways to expand these features. These mods offer creative and meaningful enhancements, from custom traits and interactions to pride-themed events and decorations.

Updated on January 24, 2025, by Jenna Amore: The Sims 4 has seen numerous updates over the years to promote inclusivity and celebrate the LGBTQ+ community, from adding pronoun options to same-sex relationship storylines. However, mods offer players even more opportunities to tailor their game to reflect diverse identities and experiences. Whether through bold makeup and fashion choices, pride-themed home décor, or customizable traits that define a Sim’s personality and romantic preferences, these mods go the extra mile. With these additions, Sims can express themselves fully and authentically, bringing deeper representation and individuality to their stories.

1 Pride Flag Facepaint

Cheeky Pride Month Celebration

  • Created by faeriesimss
  • Download Here (Tumblr)

The Pride Flag Facepaint mod is a fantastic way to celebrate LGBTQIA+ identities. It adds eight vibrant swatches of pride flags that Sims can wear on their face, perfect for Pride Month festivities like a night out at the club, a house party with friends, or a local pride event. Sims can proudly display their identities with flags representing the gay/LGBTQ, lesbian, bisexual, pansexual, asexual, intersex, genderqueer, and transgender communities.

Pride flags are more than just colorful designs; it’s about embracing and celebrating diversity within the LGBTQ+ community. Give Sims the opportunity to express themselves and their sexualities with this makeup look. Whether attending a pride parade, hosting a pride-themed party, or enjoying a day out, these facepaint options ensure Sims exude pride and show representation.

2 Pridedust Facepaint

Subtle Sparkles, Bold Statements

  • Created by Peachiiesims
  • Download Here (Tumblr)

For Sims who prefer a more subtle expression of their identity, the Pridedust Facepaint mod offers a less obvious yet equally meaningful way to show their colors. This fairy dust makeup look is perfect for Sims who are still questioning or are in the closet about their sexuality. It can also be a good everyday look for Sims who dabble with a makeup brush. Players still holding out for a reappearance of fairies in The Sims 4 can represent their desires.

With over forty different pride flag swatches available for both feminine and masculine frames, the Pridedust Facepaint mod allows Sims to celebrate their individuality in a more understated manner while still embracing the spirit of pride. Whether it's during Pride Month or any month of the year, players should consider adding this custom makeup set to their Sims' lookbook.

3 Pride Palette

Show Your Colors In Style

  • Created by XUrbanSimsX
  • Download Here (Patreon)

Bring Sims’ makeup game to life with the Pride Palette mod, featuring 16 vibrant yet natural eyeshadow colors perfect for LGBTQ+ Sims. Unlike the overly bright and unrealistic makeup options often found in-game, this palette strikes a balance between boldness and wearability.

With hues inspired by pride flags and an optional add-on of five neutral shades, Sims can celebrate their identity or keep things simple for everyday looks. Perfect for Sims attending a Pride event or just showing off their personal style, this mod ensures they’ll shine realistically and authentically. It’s a fantastic addition for players who want inclusive and expressive makeup options without compromising on quality.

4 Bloom Ear Plugs

Pride With An Edgy Flair

  • Created by bloodmooncc
  • Download Here (Tumblr)

For Sims who love edgy piercings and bold accessories, the Bloom Ear Plugs mod is a must-have. These heart-shaped tentacle plugs offer 44 stunning swatches, including 21 pride flag patterns and 23 solid colors, ensuring every Sim can showcase their unique identity and style.

Available to all Sims from teens to elders, regardless of sex or gender identity, this jewelry piece is a versatile addition to CAS options. Whether Sims are rocking an alternative look or accessorizing for queer get-togethers, these gauges add personality and flair to any outfit. Celebrate individuality and self-expression with this creative and inclusive mod.

5 Big Gay Wedding Arch

Saying "I Do" Under Colorful, Inclusive Ribbons

  • Created by queersimming
  • Download Here (Tumblr)

Make a Sim's wedding day truly unforgettable with the Big Gay Wedding Arch mod, a colorful recolor of the base game wedding arch. Featuring six pride-inspired patterns — rainbow, lesbian, bisexual, pansexual, transgender, and nonbinary — and bright flowers, this arch is the perfect centerpiece for celebrating love in all its forms.

Whether Sims are fantasizing about their dream wedding, exchanging vows with their partner, or renewing their promises, this arch adds a vibrant touch of inclusivity to the big day. Complete with pride-colored ribbons, it’s ideal for crafting the ultimate LGBTQ+ wedding venue. With this mod, every Sim couple can tie the knot in a setting that reflects their identity and love story.

6 True Colors

Fly Your Flag High

  • Created by itsonlythee
  • Download Here (Mod The Sims)

The True Colors mod is an excellent addition for Sims looking to express their pride and support in a physical way. This mod introduces a custom content flag decoration available in twelve different color swatches. Each flag is designed to represent various identities within the LGBTQ+ spectrum, allowing Sims to proudly display their true colors.

Additionally, the mod includes a bonus Black Lives Matter flag, printed in the Simlish language, emphasizing the intersectionality of social justice movements. Sims can hang these flags outside their homes to showcase their identities or in front of their businesses, like stores and restaurants, to signal their support for the community. Create a welcoming and inclusive environment by incorporating these vibrant flags into the world's surroundings.

7 Pride Heart Posepack

Capture The Heart Of Pride

  • Created by someone-elsa
  • Download Here (Patreon)

The Pride Heart Posepack mod gives Sims a way to express their pride and individuality through a series of unique poses accompanied by a custom heart accessory. This accessory, available in thirty-one different swatches, can be found in the ring section of create-a-sim. After equipping the accessory, players can place pose statues to position their Sims, select a pose, and snap a picture.

This mod is perfect for players who love capturing and sharing photos of their Sims, adding a colorful and prideful touch to their snapshots. Pose packs like the Pride Heart Posepack are especially popular among players who enjoy showcasing their Sims on social media. Whether celebrating Pride Month or simply expressing love and support for the community, this pose pack provides a fun and visually appealing way to highlight inclusivity in The Sims 4 .

8 Pride Themed Cake Set

Sweet Treats For Every Prideful Occasion

  • Created by RobinKLocksley
  • Requires: Custom Food Enabler (Mod The Sims)
  • Download Here (Mod The Sims)

Throw the ultimate celebration with the Pride Themed Cake Set mod, perfect for any LGBTQ+ event. Whether it’s a Pride party, coming out celebration, or community gathering, Sims can bake and enjoy five stunning homestyle desserts. Choose from a genderfluid tie-dye cake, an abrosexual watermelon cake, an omnisexual marble cake, an intersex sprinkle cake, or an ocean flag cake — all boasting vibrant pride flag colors in delicious multi-tiered designs.

These cakes aren’t just desserts; they’re edible expressions of identity and pride. With this mod, Sims can serve up love and inclusivity, one slice at a time.

9 Set Sexuality - Reward Traits

Build Authentic Sims With New Custom Traits

  • Created by YourFalseHope
  • Requires: XML Injector (Scumbumbo)
  • Download Here (Patreon)

Bring unparalleled depth to Sims’ identities with the Set Sexuality - Reward Traits mod, featuring a diverse array of gender, sexual, and romantic orientation traits. With options like Gay, Lesbian, Nonbinary, Pansexual, Demisexual, Genderfluid, and many more, this mod lets players craft Sims with authentic and meaningful representation. The traits can be found in the satisfaction points reward store.

Romantic orientation traits, including Aromantic, Biromantic, and Greyromantic, offer even more ways to define Sims’ relationships. There’s even a Straight Ally trait, ensuring all Sims can support the LGBTQ+ community. Free of satisfaction point costs, these traits are perfect for adding complexity and personality to Sims’ stories while celebrating inclusivity in every neighborhood.

10 Yeehaww Sims-Pride Recolours

Dress To Impress With Pride

  • Created by yeehaww-sims
  • Download Here (Tumblr)

The Yehaww-Sims Pride Recolours mod brings a vibrant and fashionable touch to The Sims 4 , perfect for those looking to enhance their Sims' wardrobes with LGBTQ-themed clothing. While the base game includes a few pride-related items, they lack the style that LGBTQ+ players yearn for. This mod addresses that by adding seventeen new custom clothing pieces, including shirts, hoodies, bandanas, beanies, necklaces, and earrings.

Each item boasts an impressive 150 color swatches, allowing Sims to represent the colors of their flags in a variety of stylish options. With such a wide array of swatches, there's something for everyone, making it easy to create unique and personalized looks for every Sim. This mod pack is ideal for players who want their Sims to dress to impress while showcasing their pride.

11 Punk Pride Stuff Pack

Alternative Pride, Authentic Style

  • Created by The Crypt O' Club
  • Download Here (Tumblr)

The Punk Pride Stuff Pack mod brings a unique and edgy twist to celebrating pride in The Sims 4 . Created by a team of punk and alternative simmers, this custom-made pack includes new objects, accessories, clothing, and makeup that are perfect for accompanying the items from the Goth Galore Kit. Each item, meticulously crafted by talented creators, is designed to infuse Sims' closets with an alternative style. There are up to twenty different flag designs for items like rainbow-studded jackets and graphic tees.

What sets the Punk Pride Stuff Pack mod apart is not just its stylish content but also its community spirit. This mod is available for free, with the creators encouraging donations to LGBTQ+ organizations and fundraisers instead of a download fee. While upgrading Sims' wardrobes and homes with pride-themed items, this mod supports important causes, making it a meaningful addition to the game.

12 Coming Out Mod

Express Your True Self, One Step At A Time

  • Created by NateTheL0ser
  • Download Here (Mod The Sims)

The Coming Out mod adds a deeply impactful and realistic feature to The Sims 4 , allowing Sims to emerge from their hiding and embrace their confidence in themselves and their sexuality by "coming out" to their friends and family. This mod introduces new interactions such as Come Out As Gay, Come Out As Bi, and Come Out As Transgender. These emotional moments are captured by mood buffs for the Sim who is coming out and those who are reacting to the news.

After coming out, Sims can perform new interactions like Tell Coming Out Story. Others can Express Acceptance for LGBTQ+ Sims, which can result in happy, sad, or embarrassed moodlets, depending on the success of the interaction. The Coming Out mod brings a significant and emotional aspect of real-life experiences into the game, enhancing storytelling possibilities and adding depths to social dynamics.

13 Pride Mini Mod

Celebrate Love In Every Form

  • Created by SeSeSimmi
  • Download Here (Patreon)

The Pride Mini Mod adds an array of exciting features that allow for a deeper exploration of LGBTQIA+ identities and experiences. This mod introduces four custom traits that can either be given to Sims in Create-A-Sim or earned through gameplay. Sims will gain access to a new interactions menu for asking questions about sexuality, discussing LGBTQ+ issues, spilling tea, talking about their sex life, and using iconic phrases like "Ooooh Ms. Thing!" and "It's Giving."

In addition to the new traits, the Pride Mini Mod also introduces a four-level career path as an LGBTQ+ Life Coach, where Sims can offer guidance, support, and assistance to those in the LGBTQ+ community. The mod also includes two new holiday traditions: Bar Hopping and LGBTQ+ Pride, which provide fun and celebratory ways for Sims to honor their identities and connect with others.

14 LGBT Mod

A Rainbow Of Realism

  • Created by PimpMySims4
  • Download Here (Patreon)

The LGBT Mod brings a comprehensive and immersive experience to The Sims 4 , adding a multitude of LGBTQ+ gameplay traits, interactions, and buffs. Equip some of the fourteen new traits, such as Bisexual, Demisexual, Non-Binary, or Questioning for diverse and nuanced storytelling.

New interactions include "Ask About Sexuality/Identity," "Encourage to Come Out," and "Discuss Current LGBT Issues." Plan and attend new events like the LGBT Meetup, Protest, or Drag Show, or utilize the calendar to create pride events. The new Pride Spirit tradition is a great way to explore the new interactions from this mod. Additionally, the new LGBT Activist aspiration is perfect for LGBT rights advocates.

15 LGBTQIA+ / Gender & Orientation Overhaul Mod

Every Sim, Every Story

  • Created by Lumpinou
  • Download Here (Patreon)

Lumpinou's LGBTQIA+ / Gender & Orientation Overhaul Mod is the ultimate tool for customizing and enhancing LGBTQ+ representation in The Sims 4 . This highly customizable mod allows players to assign a Sim's identity and orientation, opening the door to new gender affirmation and transition features. Sims can undergo medical or non-medical gender-affirming surgeries to change their bodies, voice, or walking style to align their outward appearance with their desired gender.

This mod allows players full control to define Sims' romantic and sexual preferences and add attributes, such as "Discreetly Out" or "Refuses Kisses, Embraces, and Such." For a more organic experience, however, players can use the self-discovery mode, where Sims develop crushes and learn about their sexuality over time, with options to "Ponder Orientation" and "Ponder Gender." This mod also includes the new LGBTQIA+ Hangout lot trait, creating community hotspots with special nights like Aro/Ace Night, WLW Meetup, and MLM Meetup.

item.title: Elden Ring: 7 Best Builds to Dominate PvP
item.description:
Summary

  • PvP has new territories in Elden Ring post- Shadow of the Erdtree update.
  • Various PvP builds like Shield Poker or Blight Sorcerer can offer unique playstyles.
  • Strength/Arcane, Dexterity/Intelligence builds can be deadly when split between stats.

Elden Ring is known for its brutal gameplay when facing bosses or a mass amount of enemies at once. The PvP landscape is a battleground of strategy, skill, and clashes between perfect builds. Players can adopt a range of playstyles, like a glass cannon sorcerer or a sluggish tank with a massive hammer, and make PvP a little more creative.

With the release of Shadow of the Erdtree , players gained access to new items and tweaks that have pushed PvP into new territory. The following will break down the best PvP builds that should help any duelist to enter the ring with confidence.

7 Shield Poker Build

The Immovable Pokey Object

Stats:

  • Vigor 50
  • Mind 9
  • Endurance 50
  • Strength 48
  • Dexterity 20
  • Intelligence 12
  • Faith 15
  • Arcane 32

Weapons: Antspur Rapier and Fingerprint Stone Shield

Talismans: Green Turtle Talisman, Ertree’s Favor +2, Great Jar’s Arsenal, Blessed Dew Talisman

Spells/Incantations: Scholar’s Shield, Flame Grant Me Strength, Bestial Vitality

This build utilizes the Fingerprint Stone Shield as a means to block all damage, which is usually helpful in boss fights. The Barricade Shield Ash of War is the best defensive option, but for PvP, the Shield Crash Ash of War makes use of the shield’s Madness buildup, scaling with Strength. The Scholar’s Shield spell increases the shield’s damage negation should players desire full defense.

The Antspur Rapier should get the Repeating Thrust Ash of War as a means to build Scarlet Rot faster. Together with the shield, players can become a turtle-like warrior, keeping pressure with the Shield while getting some quick stabs in between.

6 Dexterity Intelligence Build

Carian Carnage

Stats:

  • Vigor 50
  • Mind 20
  • Endurance 20
  • Strength 12
  • Dexterity 60
  • Intelligence 33
  • Faith 25
  • Arcane 9

Weapons: Star-Lined Sword or Moonveil or Carian Sorcery Sword

Talismans: Graven-Mass, Erdtree’s Favor +2, Magic Scorpion Charm, Pearldrak Talisman +3

Spells/Incantations: Flame Grant Me Strength

This build offers the ability to make persistent attacks and break the opponent’s poise. Both Moonveil and the Star-Lined sword scale with Intelligence and Dexterity, making them essential and interchangeable depending on one’s playstyle. The extra points in Intelligence also give access to great spells like the Carian Piercer or Loretta’s Greatbow.

With the focus on Dexterity in this build, the Star-Lined Sword offers the best in melee capabilities thanks to Onze’s Line of Stars Ash of War embedded into it. Moonveil works well with this build because of its Transient Moonlight Ash of War, which deals damage from afar and can be potentially backed up with ranged spells. The Carian Sorcery Sword from the DLC is a thrusting sword that doesn’t Bleed, but still scales well with Dexterity and Intelligence and also serves as a catalyst for casting spells.

5 Strength Arcane Build

Destroy & Create

Stats:

  • Vigor 50
  • Mind 14
  • Endurance 34
  • Strength 54
  • Dexterity 12
  • Intelligence 7
  • Faith 8
  • Arcane 50

Weapons: Bloodfiend’s Arm or Ancient Meteoric Ore Greatsword

Talismans: Erdtree’s Favor +2, Great-Jar’s Arsenal, Shard of Alexander, Radagon’s Soreseal/Lord of Blood Exultation

Spells/Incantations: Bayle’s Tyranny, Flame Grant Me Strength

This build splits focus between Strength and Arcane, and the bonus of Talismans makes this build deadly. The DLC weapon Bloodfiend’s Arm with the Cragblade Ash of War is perfect for Bleed enthusiasts, as its strong attack sprays blood everywhere and the Cragblade effect makes it easier to stack Bleed and break poise. The Ancient Meteoric Ore Greatsword is another DLC weapon that scales with Strength and Arcane, and its powerful White Light Charge skill stabs the opponent and follows up with an explosion.

For the Dragon Communion edge added to this build, Bayle’s Tyranny acts as a great way to destroy opponents. Its slow power up time requires a commitment to timing, but the damage is worth it, especially if the Rock Heart is used.

4 Blight Sorcerer Build

The Bringer of Darkness

Stats:

  • Vigor 45
  • Mind 22
  • Endurance 13
  • Strength 17
  • Dexterity 25
  • Intelligence 68
  • Faith 47
  • Arcane 7

Weapons: Prince of Death Staff and Eclipse Shotel / Grave Scythe

Talismans: Two Fingers Heirloom, Sacred Scorpion Charm, Erdtree’s Favor +2, Crimson Amber Medallion

Spells/Incantations: Ancient Death Rancor, Explosive Ghost Flame, Tibias Summons, Eternal Darkness, Fias Mist, Death Lightning, Golden Vow, Blackflames Protection

This build has the potential to devastate opponents using a combination of sorceries and incantations. The setup of the Eclipse Shotel in one hand and the Prince of Death Staff in the other maximizes damage output. The Staff casts spells and the Shotel builds up Death Blight if the opponent draws too close.

At a distance, players should equip the Grave Scythe with Phantom Slash Ash of War, which should be the main melee aspect of this build. Otherwise, holding multiple spells and rotating between them will bewilder opponents and provide windows of opportunity to strike or regain composure.

3 Full Strength Build

Smash and Run

Stats:

  • Vigor 50
  • Mind 10
  • Endurance 40
  • Strength 80
  • Dexterity 18
  • Intelligence 9
  • Faith 15
  • Arcane 7

Weapons: Greatsword or Giant-Crusher

Talismans: Radagon’s Scarseal, Bull-Goat, Great Jar Arsenal, Erdtree’s Favor +2

Spells/Incantations: Flame Grant Me Strength, Bestial Vitality

Should players dream of colossal weapons that can take chunks of health out of their enemies, this build offers this up with a deep investment in Strength and Endurance. The Talismans in this build are necessary to achieve full strength. The two weapons can be wielded in each hand, meaning double the attack power.

The Greatsword with Lion’s Claw Ash of War is great for physical and poise damage. The Giant-Crusher, also with Lion’s Claw Ash of War, is another perfect addition to this build, and both weapons are recommended depending on the style one chooses. The Royal Knight’s Resolve Ash of War could be a game ender, as it buffs the damage of the next landing attack by 80% and cannot be parried.

2 Arcane Bleed Build

Blood Rogue

Stats:

  • Vigor 50
  • Mind 20
  • Endurance 22
  • Strength 18
  • Dexterity 39
  • Intelligence 9
  • Faith 11
  • Arcane 60

Weapons: Nagakiba or Rivers of Blood or Eleonora’s Poleblade or Reduvia

Talismans: Lord of Blood Exultation, Erdtree’s Favor +2, Shard of Alexander, Rotten Winged Sword Insignia

Spells/Incantations: None

This build is for those who want to strike fast and utilize Bleed. For players who don’t have Rivers of Blood or prefer not to use it, the Nagakiba with the Blood Blade Ash of War is the perfect substitute. Both weapons scale with Dexterity, and this builds high Arcane level offers great Arcane-based damage. Bleed is one of the easiest and most devastating effects to apply to opponents.

Should players want a little more reach, Eleonora’s Poleblade offers a bloody way to rush enemies with the Bloodblade Dance skill. The Reduvia dagger has great range with its skill as well, offering a long-distance way to stack Bleed and pressure opponents.

1 Faith-Based Build

The Ultimate Blasphemous Blade

Stats:

  • Vigor 50
  • Mind 30
  • Endurance 30
  • Strength 15
  • Dexterity 15
  • Intelligence 9
  • Faith 70
  • Arcane 10

Weapons: Blasphemous Blade and Erdtree Seal

Talismans: Erdtree’s Favor, Erdtree’s Favor +2, Shard of Alexander, Crimson Amber Medallion

Spells/Incantations: Pest-Thread Spears, Wrath of Gold, Flame, Grant Me Strength

This build is centered around one of the best weapons in the entire game: the Blasphemous Blade. The high points in Faith ensure this sword’s powers deal the most damage possible. Any excess points should be dumped into Strength or Dexterity as the sword scales with Faith, Strength, and Dexterity.

Holding the Erdtree Seal in the other hand allows the use of incantations. The best incantation to use for damaging opponents in this build is the Pest-Thread Spears found in the DLC. This incantation should strike fear in anyone who’s been swarmed by lesser kindred of rot pests.

item.title: Destiny 2: Xur Exotic Armor, Weapon, and Recommendations for January 24
item.description:
Summary

  • Xur has returned with new exotic gear in Destiny 2 for the next few days at the Tower Bazaar.
  • Exotic weapons this week include a new Hawkmoon roll, Vigilance Wing, Wavesplitter, and the Two-Tailed Fox.
  • For those interested in exotic armor, Xur has Lunafaction Boots, Lucky Raspberry, and One-Eyed Mask.

Xur has returned again to Destiny 2 , complete with new exotic and legendary gear for players to check out for a limited time. Episode Heresy continues to lurk right around the corner as players continue to wrap up any outstanding challenges or content before the switch is made. Episode Revenant also kicked off the Past is Prologue limited time event during the Destiny 2 reset, acting as a sort of catch up mechanic for players with resources and other gear that can be claimed.

Bungie also continued sharing new details regarding Episode Heresy. Destiny 2's endgame PvP mode Trials of Osiris is getting a substantial rework in Episode Heresy as Bungie attempts to make it more rewarding and fun for all players. Essentially, any 7 wins will earn a trip to the Lighthouse, though players that manage a win streak during that time will earn better rewards. Trials of Osiris is also seeing slight mechanic and matchmaking changes as well, placing the focus more on combat rather than objective play.

With the weekend here, the exotic merchant Xur is back with a new inventory of gear for Destiny 2 players. Follow this guide for his current weekend location, news on his exotic cipher quest, as well as a review of all the exotic and legendary gear he's brought for the weekend of January 24, 2025.

Where is Xur?

Xur has now taken up permanent residence in the Bazaar area inside The Tower, so there's no more hunting when the weekend comes around.

Since the Bazaar is located between both fast travel points, players can pick either one to load into. Head into the area where Ikora and Hawthorne are and look for the Ramen Shop towards the back wall. While facing the shop, the alley is to the right, where Xur is standing.

Destiny 2 Class Armor and Exotic Cipher

Xur's role continues to offer the usual weekly quests, exotics, and legendary gear. Not only are these quests required to purchase a second fated engram, but they're necessary to acquire legacy exotic gear from the Tower kiosk. Players can earn a new cipher by completing strikes and winning crucible or gambit matches. Gain bonus points for playing with clan mates or finishing more challenging activities.

Xur's Exotic Armor

Lunafaction Boots - Warlock leg armor

Exotic Perk :

  • Alchemical Etchings - Your Rifts gain the additional ability to increase weapon reload speeds. Empowering Rift makes weapons effective over longer ranges.

The lowest roll of Xur's offering this week, it unfortunately doesn't move the need much these days, so it is by no means a must purchase.

Stat Values (63 Total):

  • Mobility +14
  • Resilience +3
  • Recovery +15
  • Discipline +10
  • Intellect +14
  • Strength +7

Lucky Raspberry - Hunter chest armor

Exotic Perk :

  • Probability Matrix - Increases the chaining capabilities of Arcbolt Grenades. Damaging enemies with Jolt lightning strikes and collecting Ionic Traces both grant additional Arcbolt Grenade energy. Arcbolt Grenades stun Overload Champions and delay their health regeneration.

Similar to the Warlock, this exotic is one of the weaker options, mainly because it only really impacts Arcbolt grenades, so it usefulness is tied to a very specific build.

Stat Values (66 Total):

  • Mobility +16
  • Resilience +8
  • Recovery +10
  • Discipline +11
  • Intellect +12
  • Strength +9

One-Eyed Mask - Titan helmet

Exotic Perk :

  • Vengeance - Highlights the target who dares to damage you. Track down and destroy them for an overshield.

At one point, this was a Crucible monster, subjected to numerous nerfs due to how popular and effective it was. While it isn't quite on that level anymore, it's still a useful tool for Titans.

Stat Values (64 total):

  • Mobility +11
  • Resilience +11
  • Recovery +11
  • Discipline +6
  • Intellect +18
  • Strength +7

Xur Inventory Items

Year 7 in Destiny 2 has upgraded Xur's inventory, adding a true rank progression system, rewards, as well as focusing options. Xur also has more than just weapons and armor as well, including:

  • Skyburner's Oath Catalyst
  • Leviathan's Breath Catalyst
  • The Xurfboard (Skimmer Board Vehicle)
  • Essentialism/Stoicism/Solipsism OR Exotic Cipher
  • Exotic Engram
  • Ascendant Shard
  • Glimmer
  • Enhancement Core
  • Nightfall Cipher
  • Strange Gift (Random Item for 1 Strange Coin)

Xur's Exotic Weapons

Year 7's Xur revamp has also added the ability to offer multiple exotic weapons in one visit. Here is what Xur has this weekend:

Hawkmoon - Hand Cannon

  • Paracausal Shot - Final blows and precision hits with Hawkmoon grant stacks of Paracausal Charge. The final round in the magazine deals bonus damage based on the number of stacks. Stowing Hawkmoon on the final round removes this bonus.
  • Extended Barrel
  • Alloy Magazine
  • Snapshot Sights
  • Heavy Grip

Vigilance Wing - Pulse Rifle

  • Harsh Truths - This weapon fires a 5-round burst. When a nearby ally is killed, gain health regeneration and increased movement speed.
  • Last Stand - Improved weapon performance and greatly increased recovery when its wielder is the last living member of a fireteam.
  • Corkscrew Rifling
  • Alloy Magazine
  • Composite Stock

Wavesplitter - Trace Rifle

  • Harmonic Laser - Laser damage has three power levels that oscillate while the trigger is held down.
  • Supercharged Battery - Collecting an Orb of Power grants a period of maximum power that starts with an automatic reload. Sustained fire in this mode suppresses targets.
  • Polygonal Rifling
  • Enhanced Battery
  • Fitted Stock

Two-Tailed Fox - Rocket Launcher

  • Twintails - Shoots two rockets, one Void and one Solar, that can track onto the same target.
  • Play With Your Prey - The Void rocket suppresses enemies. The Solar rocket causes damage over time.
  • Confined Launch
  • High-Velocity Rounds
  • Composite Stock

Xur's Destiny 2 Legendary Armor and Weapons

Xur's Set of Legendary Armor and Weapons. All gear costs 50 Legendary Shards and 1000 Glimmer.

  • Spare Rations (Kinetic Hand Cannon)
  • Nightshade (Kinetic Pulse Rifle)
  • Iota Draconis (Energy Fusion Rifle)
  • Imperial Needle (Energy Combat Bow)
  • Tarantula (Heavy Linear Fusion Rifle)
  • Thin Precipice (Heavy Sword)
  • Crown-Splitter/Quickfang/Eternity's Edge (Heavy Sword)
  • Strange Weapon Engram
  • Sovereign/Coronation Armor Set
